title: Delivered: Short Story
description: An instant modern horror delight.Lannie never leaves. She doesn't want to leave. Her small studio apartment offers safety, security and convenience thanks to her near lightning speed wifi and deluxe online delivery membership. When an unmarked package gets delivered to her doorstep, Lannie can't press control z and undo the problem. She's stuck untangling a dangerous cyber web that just might trap her in its net.30 minute read. A short mystery story.
author: Camille Cabrera
